CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 9, 1952, pg. 5 reads: "Mothers March - Mrs. Beatrice Wills, chairman of the Burrows Street "Mothers' March for the March of Dimes" and Mrs. Anna Lee are shown as they received donations from Mrs. Mary Johnson and Beverly Krappa in Terrace Village II during the house-to-house solicitation last Thursday night. Among other mothers who took part in drive were Mrs. Annie Evans, Mrs. Maggie Vernon, Mrs. Idell Williams, Mrs. Fontella Dixon, Mrs. Carmilla Jones, Mrs. Ada May Smith and Mrs. Minnie Jones. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Beatrice Wills speaking to Mary Johnson, and Anna Lee, wearing fur coat, speaking to Beverly Krappa, with collection cans and signs for "Mother's march on polio," Terrace Village II
